backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining authorization, types, and in‑memory state for users, products, categories, carts, orders, coupons, referrals, and site settings.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module passing through existing state without changes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of many frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables for light and dark modes, plus global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app entry point and disabling caching.
frontend/README.md: Project documentation describing features, local development steps, admin access, authentication, and Stripe setup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration wiring customer and admin routes with layouts and pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryEd: Dialog for creating or editing a category with form handling, validation, retry logic, and backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog for adding or editing products, including form state, image upload validation, category loading, and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Admin form to configure Stripe secret key and allowed countries with validation and status display.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Simple looping image carousel displaying homepage banner images.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Fetches and displays categories in a grid with loading state and navigation on click.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout with header, footer, loading state, and document title handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright info and a link attribution with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Main site header with navigation, search, auth controls, theme/language selectors, and cart count.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Skeleton UI components for products, categories, and order rows using shadcn primitives.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Displays product details with image, price, stock status, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Displays a product image with a placeholder fallback and error handling to swap to a default image.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/usePlaceOrd: Provides a mutation to place an order, handles backend availability errors, and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Defines all React Query cache keys for products, orders, categories, settings, and other resources.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminCatal: Admin hooks for fetching and mutating products and categories, with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminHealt: Runs periodic backend health checks using the admin actor and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminOrder: Admin hooks for retrieving all orders and updating their status with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Provides queries for checking the caller’s user role and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: User hooks for fetching and mutating cart and wishlist items with identity checks and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Fetches public product and category data with optional filters.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Fetches all available coupons from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDashboardS: Computes and returns admin dashboard statistics derived from all orders.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: User queries for retrieving all customer orders and specific order details with periodic polling.
Fetches referral user IDs associated with the logged-in user.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSiteSettin: Admin hooks for retrieving and updating site settings, enforcing a fixed shop name.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Hooks for checking Stripe configuration status and updating Stripe settings with admin access.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Initializes an anonymous admin actor using a secret token and exposes its loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Sets the page's document title, defaulting to BISAULI.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and managing login/logout flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Wraps next-themes to expose theme state and a helper flag for dark mode.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Implements a simple i18n context with English and Hindi translation dictionaries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus light/dark CSS variables for a custom color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin interface for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting product categories with backend error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Admin page listing available coupons with a simple loading state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing high-level stats like orders, revenue, and product count with refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Admin panel layout with sidebar navigation and backend health status indicator wrapping nested admin pages.
Simple admin access info page with a link to the admin panel and no authentication flow.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin interface for viewing orders and updating order statuses with loading, error handling, and status change actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product management page supporting filtering, sorting, creating, editing, and deleting products with backend error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Site settings editor allowing admins to update the shop logo with validation, previews, and backend update calls.
Placeholder user management page displaying a coming‑soon message.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user’s cart, handles quantity updates, and shows login or empty-cart states.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders product catalog with search, category, price, and sort filters synced to URL params.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page with shipping form validation, cart summary, and order placement logic.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing banners, categories, and featured products with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details with navigation to orders or home.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Customer orders page showing login gating, loading states, empty states, and a list of order summaries navigable to details.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Displays detailed order info using fetched data, showing status, date, total, and item list.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows payment failure message with options to retry checkout or go home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays successful payment message and links to orders or home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Product detail view with stock info, add-to-cart, wishlist actions, and loading fallback.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Placeholder page showing upcoming address management section.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Provides profile layout with tabs and access control, rendering nested profile routes.
User settings page for theme toggle and language selection.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Displays user wishlist items or empty state, requiring login to access.
frontend/src/utils/backendAvailabilityEr: Detects backend unavailability patterns and formats user‑friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Maps order statuses to labels, colors, and provides full status list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing priorities, architecture, known issues, and existing features.
